summary: This bill, H.R. 5719, addresses the issue of funding for the National Capital Planning Commission and the Commission of Fine Arts. It mandates interim appropriations for these entities if regular appropriations are not in place for a given fiscal year, ensuring their continued operation. The bill specifies that funds will be provided based on the previous year's operational rate and conditions until a regular appropriation is enacted. It also outlines the procedures for handling expenditures if a subsequent appropriation is passed.
